programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With the Kamalis) S2 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With the Kamalis»It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle voiture) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle voiture»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La chasse au trésor) S1 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Robot Toutou !) S6 (12/29)
programme.desc: «Robot Toutou !»Robo Puppy!: When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him! (S6, ep 7).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une journée de sport avec Blue) S3 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Une journée de sport avec Blue»Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La lettre mystère) S3 (10/18)
programme.desc: «La lettre mystère»It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! So we play Blue's Clues to find out.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Il faut sauver la princesse / La crique des bigorneaux) S1 (4/21)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver la princesse / La crique des bigorneaux»Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom»Bonnie's Mom: Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! (S2, ep 7a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lucky Necklace) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Lucky Necklace»The Lucky Necklace: Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. (S2, ep 8a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Vigo's Surprise) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Vigo's Surprise»Vigo's Surprise: Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot. (S2, ep 8b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un cargo en danger) S6 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Un cargo en danger»Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Maman Pig donne son vieil ordinateur à Granny et Grandpa Pig, mais sauront-ils s'en servir ?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Cirque de Peppa) S4 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le Cirque de Peppa»Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bac à Sable) S4 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bac à Sable»Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»Every day is an adventure for Peppa Pig! With her family and friends there's always something to smile about, and a whole world of things to discover!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le satellite) S3 (26/26)
programme.desc: «Le satellite»A satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay, the PAW patrol must fix it before it crash lands.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur) S3 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur»Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent) S3 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent»Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol and recruits Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. But when their actions attract the attention of a hungry eagle, Alex has to rescue his own team. // Alex loses his first tooth... then really loses it. He can't find it anywhere! The Paw Patrol is hot on the tooth's trail, and everyone is determined to find it before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'histoire des deux Tomás) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «L'histoire des deux Tomás»It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les épreuves du pirate protecteur) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les épreuves du pirate protecteur»On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les chevaliers en armure) S7 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les chevaliers en armure»When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course du paquet-cadeau doré) S6 (12/24)
programme.desc: «La course du paquet-cadeau doré»Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro) S4 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro»Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue) S4 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue»Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coral Dilemma) S1 (24/28)
programme.desc: «Coral Dilemma»The Coral Dilemma: When Vigo steals the colour from the coral, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back! (S1, ep 22b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.desc: «La lettre mystère»It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! So we play Blue's Clues to find out.

programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom»Bonnie's Mom: Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! (S2, ep 7a).

programme.desc: «The Lucky Necklace»The Lucky Necklace: Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. (S2, ep 8a).

programme.desc: «Vigo's Surprise»Vigo's Surprise: Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot. (S2, ep 8b).

programme.desc: «Un cargo en danger»Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Maman Pig donne son vieil ordinateur à Granny et Grandpa Pig, mais sauront-ils s'en servir ?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Cirque de Peppa) S4 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le Cirque de Peppa»Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bassin aux poissons) S4 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bassin aux poissons»Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Souvenirs de l'ancien temps) S4 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Souvenirs de l'ancien temps»Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Cache-cache avec Blue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache avec Blue»Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (15/20)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos) S3 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos»Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble's dream. The pups must rescue their super hero!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur) S3 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur»When a boy named Danny sees Ryder perform an incredible stunt during a rescue, it inspires him to become a daredevil. When Danny attempts a risky stunt, Ryder and the pups use the Air Patroller for a daring mid-air rescue! // Ryder entrusts the care of Adventure Bay to Robo-Dog while he and the Pups take a well-deserved break. But Robo-Dog goes on a fixing rampage, and Ryder and the Pups must cut their vacation short to save him!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter»Whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove in 'Whale of a Tale', then in 'The Pirate Painter', Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter. (S2, ep 5).

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure»Enrique steals all the fruit in 'The Fruit Festival', then in 'Abuelo's Treasure', the crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure. (S2, ep 6).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma meilleure amie) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Ma meilleure amie»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa and George play hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le ballon de George) S4 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Le ballon de George»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Place à l'ambulance) S7 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Place à l'ambulance»When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La fête de la neige) S6 (15/24)
programme.desc: «La fête de la neige»The Snow Spectacular: Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time. (S6, ep 17).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!
